name: Find The Zombie Master!
description:
Kill zombies with your partner (or alone) and find the Zombie Master! There is an evil secret behind this game, will you find it?

"Find The Zombie Master!" is a free game, but if you had fun with it, please consider checking out the big project I've been working on for more than 5 years now: Computer Tycoon. 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/686680/Computer_Tycoon/

Also, if you'd like to know more about how I made this game, I will upload a video about it on Monday evening to my YouTube channel:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCw9z-PjEKncbBfAgdKorh2Q?sub_confirmation=1

Controls

In the game Player 1 is the red player and Player 2 is the blue player. The Camera follows Player 1.
You can control Player 1 with WASD+E (or the left mouse button)+F. And Player 2 with the ARROWS+O+P (you can just ignore Player 2 to play alone - leave him where he is).

Features

  • An exceptionally ugly map and art I made
  • A song I wrote for the game
  • GamePad Support
  • Shared Screen Multiplayer Support
  • Lots of Zombies

Have a lot of fun! :)

Andris aka Progorion
